ygData.messageBody:
This is for those that didn't know about it but EQlink had this link for
those of you who have beastlords this chart basically gives you the skills
and spells available at each level you can go to the chart at :
http://www.brentcopeland.com/beastlord/bigchart.html

The following link is also from EQlink referral for the Beastlord Epic at :
http://www.brentcopeland.com/beastlord/epic.html

and there is also a Beastlord FAQ at:
http://www.brentcopeland.com/beastlord/faq.html

Hope these help

Cynfyn MacCulloch 51 DESK
Halyburton Bearhugger 30 BarbShm
Saltaque 12 HIEEnch
Qapmoc 11 HalfElf Ranger
Oroblram 9 Hu War
Doktari 7 HIE Cleric
Defender of the Faith
Saryn Server
